channel.title: OK I REALLY NEED HELP :L (Will pay 10$ via paypal if anyone solves...)
channel.description:
Guys, this is starting to get ridiculous. I've been posting on different website forums and troubleshooting for about a month now. I desperately need someone who is OK with MACINTOSH, and IS AN EXPERIENCED CODER. So here are the issues:
1. Not 100% sure i portforwarded correctly 2. People get this error message when attempting to join my server : "Sorry, loading char profile."
So, my Skype : Pedobearsson And, my TV: PM for TeamViewer please
If anyone can fix this problem ill pay 10$
